channel.title: Were u put the ip
channel.description:
i forgot were do u put the server ip in the source? client.java
317 delta

item.title: Were u put the ip
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Change the ip in:
Gui.class
Client.class (In client and source/ server.)

In some of them, there are 2 places to edit it at.

-Nameme123

Read full topic

item.title: Were u put the ip
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

[quote=“DeathSlay, post:1, topic:352215”]i forgot were do u put the server ip in the source? client.java

317 delta[/quote]
In some client’s it is located in “gui.java” Then you just ctrl+f and then type “serverip” then it should come up.

Read full topic

item.title: Were u put the ip
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]This belongs in the [Client Help] section. Either way, You must be editing the client files when setting the IP. There should be an EGUI.java, Open it up and look for a line similar too…

client.main(new String[] { "127.0.0.1", "127.0.0.1", "127.0.0.1"

[font=courier]Generally you will find it to have empty variables but just set them to your IP and distribute the client accordingly.

Read full topic
